featured.text: Joe: Oh, no, I don’t want to interrupt you.
Emma and Joe are looking for a live-in babysitter for their three-year-old twins, one who knows how to cook.
Joe: you come to our party tonight?

definition.zh_def: 喬，一個常見的男性名字。
definition.en_def: Joe is a common male given name.
definition.example: Joe loves to play basketball on weekends.
